#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int n,b,c=0,odd,even,num;
    cin>>n;
    num=n;
    while(1)
    {
        b=n%2;
        if(b==1)
        c++;
        n/=2;
        if(n==0)
        break;
    }
    odd = pow(2,c);
    even = num+1-odd;
    cout<<even<<endl;
    return 0;
}
